steps.title: Welcome to RoadRecorder
steps.description: Track your journey in real-time with precise location monitoring via GPS device. Our app calculates your total kilometers traveled and provides detailed insights about your drive, helping you stay informed on every trip.

steps.title: Forground Location Permission
steps.description: Driver locations are collected from the device’s native location service (GPS) to accurately pinpoint a driver’s latitude and longitude while the app is actively running and visible.

steps.title: Background Location Service
steps.description: Allows the app to track the user's location even when the app is not visible or running in the foreground. To enable background location on your device, go to App Settings > Permissions. Select Location and choose 'Allow all the time' or 'Always'.

steps.title: That's it, you are ready to start
